message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV

Reasoning: 
- cs.SD (Sound): The paper focuses on audio tasks and evaluates the proposed architecture on TIDIGITS and CHiME-3 datasets, which are related to speech recognition and sound processing. 
- cs.CL (Computation and Language): The paper deals with sequence-to-sequence mapping and natural language processing tasks, specifically word error rates (WERs) on audio tasks. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes a new modular network architecture that applies an attentional mechanism to sensor selection for multi-sensor setups, which is a machine learning problem. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes a new neural network architecture that integrates attentional mechanisms to improve performance on audio and visual tasks. 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper evaluates the proposed architecture on the GRID dataset, which is related to visual speech recognition.
